name: Animated Instrument
description: The Animated Instrument resembles a normal musical instrument when motionless. It can fly and has a delicate construction, primarily serving as a support character in combat.
memorable: Its ability to influence creatures through music makes it a unique ally on the battlefield.
goals: To support allies by enhancing their performance and incapacitating opponents with music.
relations: Often works alongside adventurers or other constructs.
environment: Commonly found in areas where music is present, such as theaters or festivals.
strengths: Immunities to poison and psychic damage. Highly effective in influencing creature behavior through music.
weaknesses: Low physical stats make it ineffective in direct confrontations. Vulnerable to antimagic effects.
attacks: Can perform melee and ranged attacks, dealing bludgeoning and thunder damage, respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Spirited Solo allows it to incapacitate creatures within range while enhancing allies' performance.
senses: Possesses blindsight within 60 feet, making it capable of detecting creatures without sight.
skills: Skilled in perception, allowing it to notice important details.
additional_information: Immunities to various conditions such as blinded, charmed, and frightened.
Functions as a normal musical instrument when motionless.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Can incapacitate creatures temporarily through its music.
Provides a bonus to attack rolls and ability checks for allies.
